website_summaries.verdict: The Slimfast High Protein shake is a good replacement for 1 or 2 meals a day, in conjunction with a healthy diet.
pros: Curbs hunger for up to 4 hrs
Minimal sugar content, with only 1 g of net carbs
cons: Lumps may develop in shake over time
Some think it has a chemical aftertaste

customer_reviews.title: Healthy meal supplement
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to lose weight in a hurry and stay healthy, try this with Drs blessings. I replaced breakfast and dinner with these drinks and had a reasonable lunch, no carbs. Have a hot tea in evening I lost 70 lbs, went from 250 to 180 in six months and I never felt better.
customer_reviews.author: Tomcat

customer_reviews.title: Moldy lid
customer_reviews.text: While the shake was good and is helping me lose weight, one of the sealed bottles was moldy upon opening. Tried returning but requires you to send the drinks back. I through out the moldy one obviously and had already used Most of them. I’m now opening every bottle w concern about if mold will be found.
customer_reviews.author: she

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: This slimfast has Chunks in it?!
customer_reviews.text: Totally gross, this slimfast came with these gross chunks inside it, I had to strain them out to make sure I wasn't drinking bugs or something else. What the hell slimfast??
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Carr

customer_reviews.title: Gelatinous clumps...
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this particular product... but I ordered a few cases from Amazon for convenience, and each shake has had pieces of gelatin-like clumps in it! I haven’t had this problem with bottles that I’ve purchased at stores... so not sure why this is the case. I refrigerate them and shake them very well. But... ew... I can drink about a third of the bottle before it’s just too lumpy. I’m dreading the 2 cases that I have left.
customer_reviews.author: TXmom

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly bad tasting
customer_reviews.text: I‘m not big on writing reviews but omg I need to get this out of my system. Just opened a bottle of strawberry slim fast and forced it down. Sickening. The stuff smells like the plastic bottle it comes in, tastes like plastic until you get to the aftertaste... When was your last bout of stomach flu? Remember that bitter bile taste after throwing up the tenth time? Well, it can be yours after just one sip of this stuff. My poor husband will get these for lunch. Btw, I’m not an otherwise person. I have no issue with any of the Atkins shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Slim Fast with 20g of protein is awesome.I don't think it's too thick like some people. I love it icy cold though and sometimes put the bottle in the freezer for 15-20 minutes. I am very overweight. I have made up my own diet that I believe will get me fast results and one I can live with. I am having 2 or 3 slim fasts a day and 2-3 8 oz bottles of V8. The Slim Fast stops my craving for sweets, and V8 stops my craving for something salty. I'll update later to let you know if it's working. So far so good. One week down.
customer_reviews.author: clynch

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I've been taking for two weeks and I've lost 7lbs. Will definitely purchase more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have digestive problems and do not eat much protein. I started using Slim Fast Advanced in March to increase my protein intake. I like the taste and the variety of flavors. One drink replaces a meal for me. Being a diabetic, I also like that it only has 1 gram of sugar. I have lost a few pounds since starting this drink but I mostly use it for nutrition not just to lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fugett

customer_reviews.title: Constipation
customer_reviews.text: We have tried a few different slim fast products and they all cause digestion, bloat, and constipation issues for both of us. When eating strictly and sensibly within the recommended caloric range for each of us, low sugar, low carb, high protein and high fiber we still experienced adverse side effects and GAINED weight or maintained current weight. I gave three stars oy because it tastes really good especially when comparing to other protein based shake products.
customer_reviews.author: Shades of Cyan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used to hate meal replacement products because they can't stop me from feeling hungry and weak in the day and most of the products advertise themselves as hunger-control. But Slimfast really works!!!! I can easily get over a whole morning with one bottle of strawberry shake (180 kcal only) and a medium apple. Now I can feel my ribs more when I'm lying down. Strawberry shakes taste more creamy and thick than the chocolate flavor. I just order the vanilla shakes today and will update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Meowlie

customer_reviews.title: Also helps hangovers
customer_reviews.text: Great for weight loss and rebuilding yourself after dehydration/ stomach bugs. Has 23% of daily recommended potassium per shake. So great for hangovers, or in my recent sitution a 24 hour stomach bug that destroyed my husband and I. As a nurse, having this made me confident we didn’t need to go to the ER for electrolyte replacement. I am not giving medical advice, just saying how having the nutrients of a meal in a smallish amount of liquid made it much easier to come back from being sick and not being malnourished.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mervine

customer_reviews.title: I love these I'm going to keep buying
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is a real review let me tell you everybody kept telling me you wasted your money ,this isn't going to work my family kept doubting me and making me feel bad but guess what they all was wrong! This taste delicious it keeps me full for at least 4 hours I'm exercising and and counting my carbs and I feel so healthy and lost 2 pounds already on 1 week so I'm seeing results and I'm happy trust me you'll love this
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer lyles

customer_reviews.title: Taped up!
customer_reviews.text: The cap was still sealed but this is how one of the bottles in the package were.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Tastes HORRIBLE and chemically
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Walmart generic of Slim Fast but i was trying to reduce sugar and since this one only had 1 gram, I figured I'd try it (I got the Chocolate ones). But it tastes HORRIBLE! It has a nasty chemically taste. I have 12 bottles so im drinking them, but they are nasty! They do keep me full for 4 hours like it says, but I have to eat or drink something after I'm done to get the taste out of my mouth. I won't be buying these again. I'd rather have the real sugar then whatever vile chemical sweetener is in here
customer_reviews.author: joshandsarah

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting slim fast shake
customer_reviews.text: I have tried tons of diet shakes and these really work! The vanilla is my favorite flavor of them all, although there are still one or two I haven’t yet tried. Also the most important thing is that these work! I replaced my everyday lunch with a slim fast advanced shake and I lost 7 lbs in a month (and I don’t have tons of weight to lose so this was a super impressive result) without really doing anything else other than switching from coffee to tea. Amazing results!
customer_reviews.author: SJR

customer_reviews.title: I mean, it's Slimfast
customer_reviews.text: This is the chocolate Slimfast. I find that you can get it on Amazon cheaper than in stores. It tastes almost like chocolate milk. This is three four-packs (12 total bottles) and you receive it in the manufacturer's packaging. These claim to give you four-hour hunger control. This is fairly accurate, at least for me. Still working on my results as I am new to Slimfast.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste; curbs cravings
customer_reviews.text: My downfall into any calorie restriction diet is how to curb my insane cravings. Sometimes, I need to emotionally "eat" whether it's out of being bored or because my body is sounding alarm bells that I will starve to death any moment. Slim Fast to me has always been a trusted product. The Advanced formula works with Keto and truly helps curb my desire to eat without feeling that fiber bloat afterwards. I've always enjoyed the taste of these drinks and this one is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Keowee

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it in store
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these a few times now. I won’t ever again unfortunately :/. I’m not sure if them traveling here in the summers heat does something to them, but the batch that I bought TWICE now, the shakes have weird platicy chunks inside. It did help curve my appetite though because as soon as it smacked my mouth, I lost my appetite the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Conner

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite diet shake. I’ve tried many other shakes such as the Atkins, Muscle Milk, etc; they all have a thick chalky after taste. Gross. This shake actually tastes somewhat like a cheap version of a milkshake. Which I’ll take over a chalk board any day! In the past 3 weeks I’m down 7lbs just by replacing this shake instead of my lunch. Takes a lot of self control but we got this! Be the best version of yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Chucoski

customer_reviews.title: I've lost 20 pounds already
customer_reviews.text: I started the SlimFast diet about a month and a half ago, and I've lost around 20 pounds. My boyfriend started at the same time, and he also lost about 18 pounds so far. Great diet plan that allows you to eat any balanced meal once a day and supplement with two shakes. I love being able to get this on Amazon and place them in the refrigerator right after receiving. With the COVID situation, not a bad thing to have on hand anyway so you aren't using up your canned goods, frozen, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Curivity

customer_reviews.title: I won't be getting my Slim Fast from Amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking Slim Fast for several years now, and am quite a fan. I have never had, not even one, that was bad. I bought 12 bottles from Amazon, with an expiration date of November 16, 2020. The first one that I opened, and started to drink, was thicker than SYRUP! I immediately spat it out. I opened one from each of the three cartons, and they were all thick. They had all gone bad, probably due to poor storage. Short story long, I won't be getting my Slim Fast from Amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Archie

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry SlimFast Makes Great Frappes
customer_reviews.text: Creamy and good tasting. Turns out he Strawberry Slim Fast is actually my favorite of the flavors. It;s not always available at my supermarket. I think others have discovered it's really good when you churn it up in the blender with some ice or just over some crushed ice. The price on this 3 pack (12-11 oz bottles) can't be beat. Very economical. Great delivery from Amazon. Speedy, prompt and reliable. Thank you so much, Amazon! Love the Amazon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Shizue Leigh Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Good price but CHUNKS... ewww
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product (1) because I was bored with my other brand of protein shake and (2) it was a much better deal! I am actually super disappointed in the Slim Fast brand and could not get past the first bottle, which was CHUNKY. The expiration date was July 2020 so there was no concern with that, so I can't figure out why there were chunks. I'm sure it's safe to drink because the chunks are likely just the protein, BUT just the texture of it made me want to vomit. If you want a similar shake with NO chunks, just get Premier ready to drink shakes. Much better in the long run, even if slightly more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like sadness and chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't mind meal replacement shakes. But while trying to nurse my bank account back to health, I decided to replace my daily breakfast of a Mocha Soylent with these bad boys. Cheaper, can't be much worse though, can they? They can. They were. I could not even finish one. So. Much. Sugar. Do yourself a favor and spend a little more money on something more palatable.
customer_reviews.author: Sepideh Nia

customer_reviews.title: but my first 3 or 4 shakes had a funny after taste
customer_reviews.text: I usually blend in berries and banana's with my slim fast, but my first 3 or 4 shakes had a funny after taste, so i decided to drink it straight from the bottle and not mix it with anything. To my surprise there were frothy thick lumps in the bottle. To think I already had 3-4 bottels already, ugh!!! No wonder i had bubble gut. I thought it was the fiber. Never again!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gentry

customer_reviews.title: High Protein
customer_reviews.text: I am NOT HAPPY with the carelessness of the packing. I know it wasn't Slimfast directly. However, they should be more cautious on who distributes for them. Now, the flavor is light and pleasant. It's smooth and creamy. The thickness is a bit much but still good.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Porter

customer_reviews.title: Bought 25 times for 15.88,  now 25,  won't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 25 different times for 15.88, now price suddenly jumped to almost 25. Will not buy again. Not worth that.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Het

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good taste. And works very good for couple weeks. When I drink one in the morning I was good true the lunch After couple of weeks my body get use to and now I’m hungry after two hours But is definitely helps
customer_reviews.author: rafal

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT Keto friendly!
customer_reviews.text: All these 20g protein shakes contain maltodextrin which, due to the high insulin spike it causes (more than sugar!) is a definite no on a ketogenic diet! They taste great, but avoid at all costs if you want to stay in keto!
customer_reviews.author: Heldensop

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the worst - terrible taste - chemical aftertaste - tastes like vomit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were cheaper than the atkins shakes. They were on sale for $12.78 about $4 less than the atkins. However, it was not worth the savings. These are the worst shakes I have ever tasted. They taste like crap, as other people have stated they have a chemical taste to them and taste like vomit. I will never buy these again. I will stick to the atkins shakes from now on. They cost a little more but they taste way better than the slimfast.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Herring

customer_reviews.title: Taste HORRIBLE !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow did Slimfast go downhill! The taste and consistency are HORRIBLE I used to drink Slimfast when strawberry and all their flavors taste like persay the strawberry TASTE LIKE A STRAWBERRY and consistency that of a milkshake The thickness like a milkshake I couldn’t wait till I’d drink my next one.NOW I COULD wait. What a shame.Especially excited to receive my shipment. Last time I’m ordering Slimfast ! Too EXPENSIVE for their quality !!!
customer_reviews.author: AUSTRIAN GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Yum. Great taste, 1g sugar and 20g protein. Yay!!! I've put this in a blender with strawberries.... chocolate covers strawberries anyone?
customer_reviews.author: L Hill

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and controls hunger
customer_reviews.text: Tasted grate. Does what it says. Been using it for two days and it does control my hunger and late night snacks. I got the chocolate flavored kind. Tastes like chocolate milk. Not sure about the weight loss as of yet because I haven’t tried it long enough. But I’ll definitely update once I’m done with the other 8 bottles. I drink two a day. Usually one for breakfast eat a healthy lunch and healthy snacks then drink another at night right before bed because that’s when my cravings kick in. I’m not always hungry. I love it. Hopefully it works for my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Pinson

customer_reviews.title: These are great for weight loss!
customer_reviews.text: I worked with a DME provider to help bariatric patients lose weight and I’ve tried a lottttt of protein shakes, these are pretty darn good (I have only tried the strawberries & cream flavor so far). Protein to calorie ratio is great. Flavor is good. Price point is decent. I’m a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: I like them, they taste good and seem to be working.
customer_reviews.text: I just started taking these on a regular basis. I try to stick to a diet of smoothies, protein shakes (slim fast) and a decent healthy meal at night and it seems to be working. I have been losing weight, I have more energy and feel motivated to do things. Taste is really good and I don't feel hungry like I used to.
customer_reviews.author: Tenyrsgone

customer_reviews.title: Simply horrible
customer_reviews.text: I drink the chocolate royale powdered shakes every morning with 1% milk. I was hoping that these would taste just as good and I can drink them for lunch. UGH, these were terrible. I took one sip and spit it out. UGH. I'm back to the powdered shakes for breakfast and lunch. They are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Gittleman

customer_reviews.title: Get them!
customer_reviews.text: So, the chocolate is kinda chalky, but def not unbearable. It is GREAT with half a banana and 1/2 tbsp of peanut butter in a blender. (I sub that in my breakfast shake for my 100 cal between meal snack). The vanilla tastes like lucky charms to me. These fill me up, and since I'm a busy graduate student they are so easy. They work too, lost 8lb my first month. Try it guys!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Keith

customer_reviews.title: Been buying these for months. too bad scamazon raised the prices 2x.
customer_reviews.text: Well, on to look for a new protein shake. These were amazing at the 12.70-15$ for 12 price they were at the last 6 months ive been buying them, but I guess SCamazon realized they were popular, and doubled the price this week.. cuz you know, fu<k all the people who are on a subscribe and save plan.. More like subscribe and get shafted. GG SCamazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good
customer_reviews.text: Taste Good, only 1 gram of sugar, same price as the Walmart Stores Stores now (They had a Price Roll Back to Compete with Amazon), but Walmart offers the Milk Chocolate as well in which I purchased that last night at the exact same price. I do prefer the chocolate over the vanilla myself. The problem with Walmart is they are nearly always out, so getting from Amazon is easy. Just wished they offered the milk chocolate at the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: THIS  four pack was tasteless and thicker than pudding
customer_reviews.text: Every rating was 1 star, although on "Thickness," a 10 would have been more accurate .Seriously, the bottled glop was unbelievably thick . I order a lot of Slimfast High Nutrition and High Energy shakes on a regular basis. This was a 'taste test' order and a disgusting disappointment. The expiration date on the 4bottles' caps was 1/21/01 P7. It's possible that 4packs like this one are the leftovers from split up 12 packs, but I'm not going to try this flavor again. I didn't want to bother with returning the other three, I just flushed their contents of down the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Chunks inside. Trashed. Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: These arrived with chunks inside. I could not wait to try this flavor. I love banana everything. I spit it right out. The expiration dates are were fine. It tasted like it was sitting on a shelf for months. II had to throw away the whole package. I shook them first. I wanted to give 5 stars for thickness because they were THICK but it was not a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Maroon2472

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, filling, and low-sugar, low-carb.
customer_reviews.text: I try to keep these on hand for on-the-go meals. The strawberry is my favorite! Because it's vitamin-enriched, I'll just grab a pack of peanut butter crackers (for the crunch-factor) to eat with the beverage, and I'm satisfied until the next mealtime. I've tried other similar products and find the taste falls short of Slim Fast's deliciousness. And it delivers vitamins without a vitamin-y taste. Plus, as a diabetic, it fits the bill, as it's low-carb and low- sugar. The protein boost is great, too, as sometimes we don't quite get enough over the day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mani

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting chunky congealed product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for the first time off of Amazon. I usually buy them in the grocery store but I decided to try an online order of 12 (3 packs of 4). Big mistake!! I took one drink of one and that was it. The consistency was chunky and gross....I don't know if they were expired or what but that was completely disgusting. My son tried one from a different 4-pack and it was the same.....almost congealed lumps all through it. That is so freaking nasty. Be careful when ordering these....FYI!! Return to sender!
customer_reviews.author: K Lea

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good product, It keeps me full for about 4,5 hours I replayed my breakfast and dinner with this and we’ll see how it goes. It has a lot of good vitamins too. I got the vanilla flavor so I can mix and drink it with anything, first time I tried it with berries smoothie and I hated it because I was tasting the falavor and nothing else , and after that I tried it with 1 spoon of coffe a little bit of boiling water like about 3 spoon and the I add my vanilla slimfast and I add 4 ice cubes and it tasted soooooooooo goooooooooood.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet, the powder version is better
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to the powder version mixed with milk and it tastes good, so I decided to try this bottled version. It was a bad decision. The bottled version is weirdly sweet, really sweet, too sweet, even after mixing it with milk with ratio 1:1. I only bought the chocolate though so not sure how about the other ones, but I think I will just stick to the powder version.
customer_reviews.author: Nyan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely smooth flavor, but no seal on any bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor of these, and its definitely my #2 after chocolate. I use this as a workout shake because of the protein content when I dont have time to make my own. What sketches me out from this product and the only reason I dont give it 5 stars is because they don't have any hard seal in the individual bottles. Once you unscrew the cap, theres no film to ensure that it hasn't been tampered with or to keep the lids from unscrewing and spilling everywhere during transport. It hasn't been a problem for me, and the caps do look very airtight - but it just unsettled me.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: lumpy -overheated in AZ ?
customer_reviews.text: First order lumpy so Ordered replacement showed up lighting fast but also lumpy and seems spoiled ? Don't think that is the way Slimfast should be - drink lots of other flavors none are lumpy. Suspect where ever these 2 were stored got hot in AZ where temps have been over 110 degrees and spoiled them.
customer_reviews.author: warpspeed

customer_reviews.title: NOT PACKAGED WELL!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my 'Slimfast Advanced Nutrition Shakes and Keto Snack Bars'. KUDOS to the Amazon driver who carefully handled my outer box. UNFORTUNATELY, WHEN I OPENED THE OUTER BOX. I DISCOVERED THAT ONE OF MY SLIMFAST {BEVERAGE SHAKES} BOXES WAS COMPLETED EXPOSED. SOMEONE DIDN'T SECURELY ADHERE THE BOX! During this COVID-19 pandemic, I disinfected both the outer box and all the items inside once...I DISCOVERED THAT ONE OF MY SLIMFAST {BEVERAGE SHAKES} BOXES WAS COMPLETED EXPOSED AND INADQUENTLY AFFIXED!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: There were lumps!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my second 4 pack of these, and there were literally lumps in it!! I shook it again really hard and took another sip, but nope, LUMPS!!!! Same goes with the second pack of strawberry ones. Not even going to try the third pack. such a waste, because I love these things. Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Krazy Katz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awful
customer_reviews.text: I used to get this years ago for days when braces were adjusted and these were really good then, creamy and very shake like. This is absolutely awful now, thin, funny after taste, just terrible. Nothing like they used to be, do not buy, you’d be better off drinking Boost even though those aren’t so great they are better than Slimfast is now.
customer_reviews.author: K. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this to cut some weight for her HS wrestling. She likes the taste of this and the convenience. It’s helped her drop about 5lbs so far. We also tried Pure Protein shakes in vanilla. I preferred the pure protein but she prefers this one. She wants to try some of the other flavors so we are going to get her different flavors of the slim fast.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’m going as disappointed I gain weight instead of losing
customer_reviews.author: Nabila Abusway

customer_reviews.title: Shipping spoiled cases
customer_reviews.text: I wondered why some seem thicker than others then realized they were spoiled and had chunks in them. And its not like a case of 12 may have one or two bad. When one is bad the entire case of 12 are all bad even though they are not past expiration date. Was getting 3 cases a month and every month one of cases has spoiled ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J.

customer_reviews.title: Do not like this flavor - super artificial tasting
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like this flavor at all - I’ve been drinking slim fast for a long time and was interested in trying a new flavor. My favorites are the creamy chocolate and the mocha cappuccino. Not sure what I was thinking because it’s exactly what you would think it tastes like: super artificial banana candy. Yuck
customer_reviews.author: Jrohay

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well
customer_reviews.text: Given the shelter in place, I looked for a meal replacement shake. This worked out pretty well. Room temp was fine though chilled was better. It was quite acceptable as a shake. It seemed to deal with hunger reasonably well. Am I following Slim Fast protocol? Heck no, but for the price and taste it has been alright. Even the empty containers were pretty sturdy so I have been rinsing them out just in case I find some use for them.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Choice of 1gram or 20 grams of sugar
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. But here's the thing, read the grams of sugar beforehand. Just because it says SlimFast, doesn't mean you're going to lose weight. I say this because they have an identical bottle that says 20grams of sugar and not 1gram It usually has a dark blue top instead of a red top. They don't do it on purpose, just that it's another product. (though it's still the same old SlimFast) just that they have it for people whom are not diabetic. Otherwise, they are both excellent products.
customer_reviews.author: G.C.

customer_reviews.title: Dont like the taste
customer_reviews.text: Not to happy with the taste its to thick plus i didnt taste the banana more the cream. I use to drink the slim fast back in 2000 lost alot of weight went from 325 to 199 within 9mths was thrill. Then i had more kids and gain some weight once again so i wast trying the same method but cant find the banana slim fast in the can and i dont like any other flavor so not i have to go back to the drawing board again.
customer_reviews.author: Laroyaltieproduction

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: This order of the slim fast had the worst taste as if it was spoiled. Don't Know if they do but they tasted horrible and I've been drinking these for years never got any that taste like this..
customer_reviews.author: L P

customer_reviews.title: Slim fast  Advanced nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Bruce has a better flavor but I don't know if they have something Betty's Keto friendly, Use it twice yesterday once before bed and blood sugar did not spike that is a good thing , for diabetics. Just which the flavor was a little bit more chocolatey and the consistency with a little thicker cautioned not to freeze this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. J.

customer_reviews.title: Formula has changed?
customer_reviews.text: These are clumpy and the consistency varies from bottle to bottle. I've been ordering Slim Fast shakes for the past seven months and have loved them. But the past couple months they have been clumpy and changing consistency like they are spoiled, though the expiration is next year. And this is happening to all the flavors I buy. They still taste great, but I can't get over the surprise clumps and clotting here and there. I will be buying another brand from now on sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: Banana Cream is yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Just tried the Banana Cream, delicious! Please make this flavor available by the box (three-pack) like the other flavors to save a little money!
customer_reviews.author: P. Mcfall

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Tried for 2 months and did not lost a pound so now I'm going to the gym and trying keto drive
customer_reviews.author: Lee Hadler

customer_reviews.title: What are these Gelatinous clumps?
customer_reviews.text: I really love the slimfast advanced nutrition drinks, but I noticed that in some of the bottles that I've ordered, there have been gelatinous clumps in my shake. They seem harmless, so I was thinking it had to do with temperature fluctuations, but I'm not sure. Anyway, it's gross drinking slime, so I return the boxes that are like that and get new ones. The drinks that don't have this problem are fantastic and they do control hunger and taste wonderful. I definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rex

customer_reviews.title: SLIME
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor of the chocolate BUT it has all kind of lumps it. Almost like some spit in every bottle. I know that isn't true it's just what it feels like it. I've tried all the variety of the chocolate and they all have what I call slime in it. I'm not talking about just one instance in each bottle but about 6 or 7 times per bottle. I'd sure would like to know what these lumps (or slime) is.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H.

customer_reviews.title: Contaminated product. Smelled and tasted like poison.
customer_reviews.text: The product was rancid and made me sick. I have orderd before it was okay. I tried two bottles and made me very sick. These were contaminated.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: It has a much better flavor even when mixed with just water
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this. I prefer the powder mix. It has a much better flavor even when mixed with just water. I did add water to these and it helped, but still not something I want to drink all the time. The powder mix tastes 10 times better.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla5599

customer_reviews.title: Better taste than Boost!
customer_reviews.text: I've been having to stick with a liquid or pureed diet, and Boost was one way I was trying to get enough nourishment. I didn't like it. I saw this Slim Fast Meal Replacement drink. It had lots of vitamins, fiber, low carb, and was a reasonable prices compared to Boost. I just had my first drink, and I like it much better than Boost! I'll be reordering more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Rebel Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wow this actually tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I have always been in great shape but this last holiday I enjoyed too much food and packed on a belly lol. So I wanted to try this and was really surprised at how great it tastes since usually health products like this are really bland or bad. This tastes like a vanilla shake you would get at a restaurant. I also like there is no caffeine so I can drink it during my days off at home.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nashville

customer_reviews.title: You probably will get diabetes from this
customer_reviews.text: This taste awful over sweet and terrible for your stomach. I've tried the whole 12 bottles and i gained more weight than before.
customer_reviews.author: clikewise

customer_reviews.title: Never next day delivery as it states
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this for a while it states next day delivery with prime but that almost never happens on this product. So order early so not disappointed as I have been so many times with this delivery. I like the creamy Chocolate Drink. I am not on a diet but do not like to take vitamins so I have found this to be a great vitamin supplement for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful if you have allergies
customer_reviews.text: I ordered vanilla creme. Received strawberry creme. I didn't have my contacts in....luckily I only have a mild strawberry allergy. Tried multiple times to submit a return and complaint through amazon....got the oops...something went wrong on our end with the dog picture that is supposed to make you feel better about your luck i guess....3 days later...no luck... will give these to a colleague I guess...i can't drink them...they would kill me. Amazon doesn't care. Cute dog pic though 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great except for price increase
customer_reviews.text: These are great to drink for breakfast on the way to work in the mornings. Amazon, why did the price go up so much? Looking for an alternative until the price comes down.
customer_reviews.author: cards&crafts

customer_reviews.title: vanilla milkshake
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! I actually do not use them for weight loss. I am always in such a hurry so these are a really great quick/on the run meal for me. It really does help with hunger for hours. Especially if I eat a few nuts or pretzels. The vanilla cream ones taste just like a vanilla milkshake. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: MommyE

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: The sugar alcohol taste is pretty strong at first taste but eventually your taste buds adjust and it's not terrible. I did notice similar texture issues as other reviewers. There appeared to be some chunks but not an unreasonable amount. That being said I think I'll be switching to powder instead of the ready made bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: NOT BANANA🤐👎🏼👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: Not for me 👎🏼👎🏼☹️ The banana flavor is TOO THICK For Me. I had to throw away 3 out of 4 bottles. 💕Royal Chocolate💕 You can send me that flavor ALL DAY😀
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Chunks in the drink.
customer_reviews.text: I normally like these drinks but I get them at my local grocery. I don’t know if these were stored improperly or what happened, but they all had chunks in them. So gross! I won’t be buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: WithTheElmTrees

customer_reviews.title: Decent flavor, for a while
customer_reviews.text: The flavor and texture are pretty good at first. After about a week, I could not endure it anymore. I started having stomach pains as well so I did more research on the ingredients. It appears that this product could actually damage your intestinal health over time and lead to more weight gain. Not worth the risk.
customer_reviews.author: a person

customer_reviews.title: To overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The vanilla cream tastes really good but it's too expensive for 12 pack... If you added up it's $25 so it's like $2 for 1 10 oz bottle..where is the deal in that???
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Affordable price but weird taste
customer_reviews.text: It has a very good price for a meal replacement shake compared to other brands. But the taste is strange, so this is a good product if you are not very picky.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Very sickly sweet with awful artificial sweeteners/chemical after taste. I love original slim fast, this one is just no good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slimy chunks!
customer_reviews.text: It had gross slimy chunks in every bottle!! No matter how much a shake them up. I bought so many of these! I’m so upset. I’ve bought them at the store before and they don’t have chunks and they taste good with a normal texture. I got my strainer and there were so many of these slimy chunks in all 5 bottles I strained. And they want me to return the bottles for a refund. I don’t have a car and that’s why I ordered these online! So now I’m out $40 and stuck with nasty slimy chunky slim fast that I’m just going to throw away it’s so gross.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barry

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Worst. Drink. Ever. So gross tasting...I’ll stick with the classic.
customer_reviews.author: Lon V.

customer_reviews.title: UNHEALTHY DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the most unhealthiest products out there, and it’s being sold as a weight loss product? More like WEIGHT GAIN. While the chocolate flavors contains 1g of sugar, it is actually ARTIFICIAL SUGAR which is really bad for you. Various studies have shown that this doesn’t work. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious - beware of temp during shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love this advanced nutrition slim fast. Be careful - if they get hot during shipping the protein gets really thick and chalky. May be better to purchase in store. But they are delicious and keep you full.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Just started opening this item and it was lumpy and no good.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed Amazon only has a 30 day return on this type item. I buy a lot of this in different flavors and just got around to this flavor and the expiration date is 1/20/2021. This is only sept. 2020. I love Amazon, shop weekly and so sad this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting these through subscribe and save over the past year and I like the taste .I also like the fact that it's low in carbs. I recently tried the nutrisystem vanilla shake but it's really not good compared to this one so I'm sticking to the Slim-Fast vanilla shake thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ninjini2020

customer_reviews.title: Best Slim Fast Flavor!!!
customer_reviews.text: Banana Cream is the best - my morning smoothing is super simple: Banana slim fast, maybe a tablespoon of instant coffee, sprinkle with cinnamon, 1 cup vanilla unsweetened almond milk, artificial sweetener, blend, and you will be and ready for the day!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Snyder

customer_reviews.title: wellWorking
customer_reviews.text: I have lost about 10 lbs in 3 weeks. I am just working out my own diet and this is about 1/3 of it rather than 2/3. This is lower carb than other varieties. Glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Maga

customer_reviews.title: Great for losing weight
customer_reviews.text: These shakes are delicious! I ordered the creamy milk chocolate flavor. It is perfect if you are trying to lose weight. I usually drink a shake at night in replace of a meal. I’ve lost a few lbs just dieting alone and drinking my shakes. There are only 2 grams of sugar in a 11 oz bottle. I even add it to my morning coffee and it helps suppress my appetite. I will be ordering more shakes for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Medz247

customer_reviews.title: If you stick to the plan you will lose weight
customer_reviews.text: If you use slim fast as it’s intended you will lose lots of weight. Combined with diet and exercise I lost 13 pounds in the blink of an eye
customer_reviews.author: Redsnapper

customer_reviews.title: Chunks in the chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: I saw previous comments that said there was chunks in the chocolate flavor but I still got it because I didn’t have that problem with the strawberry one but they were right! The chocolate flavor has chunks in it and it’s disgusting. I exchanged it for the strawberry flavor and that was fine! I’m giving a one star because they should fix the problem if more then one person is telling complaining about an issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad after taste!
customer_reviews.text: Although I have purchased these in the store and drink them quite often I got it three dollars cheaper on Amazon the aftertaste was disgusting it tasted like puréed baby food the carrot kind nasty .
customer_reviews.author: malachi perry

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and it works
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste and have lost ten pounds but do not like the plastic that must be recycled and the price is high across the board not an individual seller issue. This seller is spot on. I switched to the powder form to help with my guilt complex!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tasted like I was drinking rotten chocolate water-milk mixture. Will NEVER buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cait Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Slimy chunks
customer_reviews.text: I love slimfast; however, am unable to get them anymore without slimy chunks in them. I wish they could get this fixed. Have called numerous times to no avail. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Keto Meal Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing 3 packs of 3 of these for a few months now. They are the perfect meal replacement for morning. However, I think the “4 hour hunger control” may be a little overstated. I can usually go about 2-2 1/2 hours with these before I need another snack. They taste great and are perfect for the Keto Diet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Chunks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve drank this brand from Meijer before and never had a problem but these had chunks of protein in them! I tried 2, my husband tried 1, and all 3 had chunks in them! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNA STEWART

customer_reviews.title: Chalky taste
customer_reviews.text: They taste very chalky to me I ordered the chocolate ones. I'll drink them because quite frankly I'm a fatty but in all honesty if this was something that I would have to look forward to twice a day that would satisfy me that I would enjoy the taste this would not be it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Renea

customer_reviews.title: Easy and good protein.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my brother who was using as a meal replacement when he did not feel up to cooking. He likes this flavor and the protein content.
customer_reviews.author: Swedie

customer_reviews.title: Replace late-night sweets
customer_reviews.text: Using it to “kick” a massive life-long sugar 🖤habit. I have one in the evening instead of the usual sweet snack and it’s working!👍🏻😃
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Davis

product_meta.title: SlimFast Advanced Nutrition Shake - Ready to Drink Meal Replacement - 20g Protein
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Strawberries & Cream| Size:12 CountYes, you can have strawberries as part of your weight loss plan! The advanced Nutrition strawberries & Cream shake is part of the Slim-Fast Plan, America’ S #1 best-selling weight loss shake brand. The Slim-Fast Plan is proven to help you lose weight fast and keep it off. See results in just one week!
with 40 clinical studies, independent researchers confirm that Slim-Fast works. For over 40 years, Slim-Fast has helped millions of people just like you lose weight and keep it off. With the Slim-Fast Plan, losing weight is easy as 1-2-3: simply enjoy one of your favorite 500 calorie meals, replace two meals a day with Slim-Fast Shakes, smoothies, or baked treats and indulge in Slim-Fast snacks to satisfy your hunger. It’ S easy to start any time— just pick a date, lose the weight!
the Slim-Fast Advanced Nutrition strawberries & Cream shake is a meal replacement containing 20g of protein, 5g of fiber, and only 1g of sugar. It can help control hunger for up to 4 hours and, because it’ S easy to grab-and-go, this high protein shake is convenient for any lifestyle. It also contains 180 calories, offers 24 vitamins and minerals, and is gluten Free. Even better, it has been awarded “ best shake” by men’ S health and was designated by OK! Magazine as “ the best way to lose weight.&Rdquo;
drink it off, blend it off, and snack it off! How you lose weight and keep it off is up to you! Whatever your day throws at you and no matter how hectic life gets, the Slim-Fast Plan offers flexibility and simplicity. It’ S easy to start any time — just pick a date, lose the weight!
feature_bullets: Great taste - Delicious strawberries & Cream flavor, Gluten free and 99.8% Lactose Free
Ideal for low-carb - SlimFast advanced Nutrition shakes as low as 1g Net Carb
Curbs hunger - SlimFast advanced Nutrition shakes are an exceptional meal replacement product that curbs hunger for up to four hours
Packed with protein, vitamins & minerals - the advanced Nutrition shakes contain 20g of protein, 1g of sugar along with 24 essential vitamins and minerals.
Digestive support - SlimFast advanced Nutrition shakes contain 5 grams of fiber to help promote better digestion
Part of the clinically proven SlimFast Plan - the SlimFast Plan offers flexibility and simplicity to make losing weight as easy as 1 - 2 - 3
